name: 齊世緯
objective:
Fall semester, 2008 / Gloria Chi
Course Description
The aims of the course are primarily to help students improve their reading and learning processes needed for
study in Higher Education at college level, and prepare students with some basic English skills of reading,
listening, speaking and writing. The course will focus on wide reading.  The reading materials incorporate
articles selected from different sources such as the textbook of “Six-Way Paragraphs (Advanced Level),” English
newspapers and magazines, and the like.  The format of the course will combine lecture, discussion, and writing,
2 hours per week.  Requirements include a few quizzes, a mid-term examination, a final examination, and a 
Chinese translation of the topics of all the 50 articles of the text book (due by Jan. 7, 2009)..
